_source.short_desc: Integrated business management solution that automates financial, customer relationship and supply chain processes.
_source.long_desc: Microsoft Dynamics is a line of integrated, adaptable business management solutions that enable your people to make important business decisions with greater confidence. Microsoft Dynamics works like and with familiar Microsoft software-easing adoption and reducing the risks inherent with implementing a new solution. These solutions automate and streamline financial, customer relationship, and supply chain processes in a way that can help you drive business success.
_source.pricing_details:
Customer Insights: From $1500 Per tenant/month
Customer Voice: From $200 per tenant/month
Sales Professional: $65 per user/month
Sales Enterprise: $95 per user/month
Sales Premium: $135 per user/month
Microsoft Relationship Sales: $162 per user/month

Please contact Microsoft for further pricing details.
_source.target_audience: Dynamics 365's plans can accommodate for households, individuals, or even enterprises.

category_features.name: Calendar/Reminder System
category_features.definition: Notifications/alerts for upcoming events or tasks

category_features.name: Contact Management
category_features.definition: Store and find contact information such as names, addresses, and social media accounts

category_features.name: Document Storage
category_features.definition: Store documents in a centralized location for easy access

category_features.name: Email Marketing
category_features.definition: Create and send email blasts/campaigns

category_features.name: Internal Chat Integration
category_features.definition: Integrate with real time communication tools like Slack, etc.

category_features.name: Lead Generation
category_features.definition: Manage the process of attracting and converting people into leads

category_features.name: Lead Management
category_features.definition: Store information about leads and contacts and track them through the sales process

category_features.name: Marketing Automation
category_features.definition: Integrate with marketing automation tools

category_features.name: Mobile Access
category_features.definition: Access the software remotely via mobile devices

category_features.name: Quotes/Estimates
category_features.definition: Create and send a quote or proposal to a customer

category_features.name: Segmentation
category_features.definition: Group leads or contacts based on their specific characteristics

category_features.name: Social Media Integration
category_features.definition: Integrate with Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, etc.

category_features.name: Task Management
category_features.definition: A running list of action items and their respective status

category_features.name: Territory Management
category_features.definition: Organize customer data and accounts by user or geography

category_features.name: Billing Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can view past bills and pay current invoices

category_features.name: Contact Database
category_features.definition: Centralized database of an organization's customers and clients

category_features.name: Contingency Billing
category_features.definition: Business model where clients pay their lawyer a fee only if the case is won/settled successfully

category_features.name: Customizable Invoices
category_features.definition: Brand invoices with organization's logo

category_features.name: Dunning Management
category_features.definition: Process of automatically notifying clients when payments fail to ensure invoices are paid

category_features.name: Hourly Billing
category_features.definition: Business model that charges based on the amount of time spent

category_features.name: Mobile Payments
category_features.definition: Clients can submit payments via mobile devices

category_features.name: Multi-Currency
category_features.definition: Manage and handle various international currencies

category_features.name: Online Invoicing
category_features.definition: Create, send, and view electronic invoices

category_features.name: Online Payments
category_features.definition: Payment webpage where clients can pay bills

category_features.name: Payment Processing
category_features.definition: Accept, record, and reconcile financial transactions

category_features.name: Project Billing
category_features.definition: Business model that bills clients an amount based on the project/task/job performed

category_features.name: Recurring/Subscription Billing
category_features.definition: Business model that bills clients repeatedly based on set amount of time

category_features.name: Tax Calculation
category_features.definition: Location based taxes

category_features.name: "What If" Scenarios
category_features.definition: A type of technique planning that allows businesses to input hypothetical variables in order to simulate potential outcomes

category_features.name: Asset Lifecycle Management
category_features.definition: Manage, prioritize and plan for capital expenses

category_features.name: Cash Management
category_features.definition: Collection, handling, management and usage of an organization's funds

category_features.name: Consolidation/Roll-Up
category_features.definition: Combine and merge loans, assets, liabilities, and other financial data and items into one entity for reporting purposes

category_features.name: Expense Management
category_features.definition: Plan, pay and track business related expenses.

category_features.name: Forecasting
category_features.definition: Form predictions based on past and present data/trends

category_features.name: General Ledger
category_features.definition: Centralized accounting record which tracks all financial transactions

category_features.name: Income & Balance Sheet
category_features.definition: A statement detailing the financial position of a business including assets, liabilities, and equity at a certain point in time

category_features.name: Multi-Company
category_features.definition: Manage the accounting and financial aspects of multiple locations or companies in a single location

category_features.name: Multi-Department/Project
category_features.definition: Manage the accounting and financial aspects of multiple operations and departments or ongoing projects from a single location

category_features.name: Profit/Loss Statement
category_features.definition: A type of financial statement used to record and report an organization?s revenues, costs, and expenses over a specific amount of time

category_features.name: Version Control
category_features.definition: Track revisions and updates to collateral, and navigate between versions of the same documentation

related_products.short_desc: Drive growth with Sales Cloud 360, the best-in-class sales solution that drives rep productivity on the world's #1 CRM platform.
related_products.features: Drive growth with Sales Cloud 360, the best-in-class sales solution that has helped power the world's best sales teams on the world's #1 CRM platform. Firms of all sizes, industries, and geographies, realize value faster with Sales Cloud 360. Increase rep productivity with data driven selling by quickly deploying industry-specific apps and best practice processes.  You also get access to 150,000+ sales organizations and a 2 million user-strong community that are passionate about sales growth.

related_products.short_desc: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster.
related_products.features: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster. As the backbone for your customer relationships, they provide AI-powered, user-friendly tools anyone can use to be successful. Mailchimp puts your audience at the center so you can send marketing emails and automated messages, create targeted ad campaigns, build landing pages, send postcards, facilitate reporting and analytics, and sell online.

related_products.short_desc: Zoho CRM empowers SMBs & enterprises with a 360? customer relationship lifecycle management solution built on an omnichannel platform.
related_products.features: Zoho CRM empowers SMBs & enterprises with a 360? customer relationship lifecycle management solution. Key features include contact management, sales funnels, pipeline management, workflow automation, AI-powered conversational assistant, task management, managing marketing campaigns, sales forecasting, customer support & service, inventory management, reporting & analytics, and seamlessly integrate with 500+ popular business apps in a single business system.

related_products.short_desc: HubSpot CRM has everything you need to organize, track, and build better relationships with leads and customers.
related_products.features: Whether you've got a small team of five or a sophisticated sales force of 500, HubSpot offers pricing and packaging options that grow with you. HubSpot customer relationship management (CRM) software is built for companies that want to spend less time logging data. It keeps all your contacts in one centralized, customizable database. And you can see everything about a lead in one place -- no more digging through inboxes to find information. Start using the free HubSpot CRM today.

related_products.short_desc: ClickUp is the future of work - it's one app to replace them all. ClickUp is the #1 fastest growing productivity app in 2022.
related_products.features:
ClickUp is an all-in-one productivity platform that eliminates work silos. It's the hub where teams come together to plan, organize, and collaborate on work using tasks, Docs, Chat, Goals, Whiteboards, and more. 

Easily customized with just a few clicks, ClickUp helps teams of all types and sizes deliver work more effectively. By replacing inflexible and overlapping tools, ClickUp helps teams save one day each week!

related_products.short_desc: Pipedrive is an easy to implement CRM software tool that helps you focus on the activities that drive deals to close.
related_products.features: Pipedrive is a sales-focused customer relationship management tool that teams of all sizes love using. With 100'000+ paying customers spanning across 179 countries, sales teams are drawn in by our CRMs simple yet powerful design that prioritizes usability above all else. When using Pipedrive, nothing falls through the cracks, allowing your team to spend less time filing and more time selling with a CRM software that is both agile and powerful.

related_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.
related_products.features:
Smartsheet, an online work execution platform, empowers organizations to plan, track, automate, and report on work. Over 80,000 brands rely on Smartsheet for project and work management because of its easy-to-use interface, real-time gantt charts and dashboards, and work automation features. 
*2018 Awards: Named a Leader in Enterprise Collaborative Work Management by Forrester Research, Selected to Deloittes Fast 500 List, Recognized for Technology Innovation & Vision by 451 Research

related_products.short_desc: Nimble is the simple, smart CRM for Office 365 & G Suite that works for you -- everywhere you work.
related_products.features: Nimble is the simple, smart CRM for Office 365 & G Suite that works for you by automatically combining your contacts, communication histories, email inboxes, and calendar appointments with over 250+ SaaS business app contacts and social media connections (including Linkedin, Twitter, Facebook) into one unified team relationship manager.

related_products.short_desc: ActiveCampaign CRM helps you sell more in less time by combining automated lead prioritization, task creation, and contact management.
related_products.features: ActiveCampaign's CRM combines contact organization with sales automation, helping you sell more in less time. Prioritize your leads, keep track of your tasks, and automate contact management so nothing falls through the cracks. See your whole sales process at a glance and track every interaction, keeping your team on the same page. Features like lead scoring, win probability, and automated segmentation combined with marketing automation turns your team into a well-oiled, deal-closing machine.

related_products.short_desc:
The smarter way for small businesses to do great work
Keap organizes your client information & daily work in one place, freeing you up
related_products.features: Grow your business with the all-in-one CRM, sales & marketing software for serious business owners. Our platform organizes your customer information and daily work in one place, freeing you up from repetitive tasks so you have more time to focus on growing your business.

related_products.short_desc: Run your business your way with a fully integrated CRM for small to medium sized businesses.
related_products.features: Stay organized as you scale and grow. Finally, a CRM that?s easy to use, fully customizable and puts you in control of how you manage your leads, customers, tasks, team, projects, marketing and more. Create your free account to start customizing your CRM today.

similar_products.short_desc: NetSuite CRM+ delivers your business with powerful front-office capabilities in a single, cloud-based CRM solution.

CRM+ seamlessly integrates your customer-focused activities with accounting, e-commerce, warehousing and shipping applications to support your entire sales process and customer life cycle starting from a lead, and progressing through opportunity, sales order, fulfillment, renewal, upsell, cross-sell and support.

similar_products.short_desc: Improve your team's accountability and productivity with flexible CRM that matches your sales process exactly.
similar_products.features: Improve your team's accountability and productivity with a flexible CRM that matches your complex sales process exactly. Track tasks, leads, and opportunities in real time. Built-in mobile forms and workflows keep everything moving, trigger-based actions make your team more productive, and automated reporting keeps your stakeholders in the know. Find out why over 80% of the Fortune 50 trusts Quickbase.

similar_products.features: Act! Premium, a powerful CRM and Marketing Automation tool in one platform, is perfect for small and midsize businesses looking to market better, sell more, and create customers for life. With unparalleled flexibility and freedom of choice, Act! Premium accommodates the unique ways you do business, whether it's on-premises (Act! Premium Desktop), in the cloud (Act! Premium Cloud), or, you can leverage a hybrid deployment for maximum flexibility!

similar_products.short_desc: TigerLRM is an all-in-one Sales Enablement Software with tools for Content Management, Training & Coaching, In-Built CRM, and more.
similar_products.features:
TigerLRM is an All-in-One Sales Enablement Software with essential tools such as Content Management, Training & Coaching, In-Built CRM, and more!

Bring out the Tiger in your sales team with a highly intuitive, easy-to-use suite of Sales Enablement and CRM tools that help sales professionals focus on hunting and closing leads. TigerLRM comes fully equipped with built-in features and tools that cut down on sales guesswork and presumptions.

similar_products.short_desc:
Every CRM tool you need to manage clients, proposals, contracts, invoices, payments, and more. 

Use code "ONLY1" to start for $1/mo.
similar_products.features:
The go-to CRM for independent professionals-that's HoneyBook.

HoneyBook makes it easy to book more clients, manage projects, and get paid all in one place.

With proposals, invoices, contracts, payments, and scheduling at your fingertips, you have everything you need to give clients a great experience.

Get your first 6 months for just $1/mo with code "ONLY1".

similar_products.short_desc: monday sales CRM empowers sales teams to manage every aspect of their sales cycle and customer data in one centralized place.
similar_products.features: Perfect for small-medium businesses, monday sales CRM is a no-code fully-customizable CRM built on top of monday.com Work OS. Dubbed the CRM without the frustration, it handles all sales processes and client communication in one place. From capturing leads, managing contact info, tracking deals or collaborating across departments, monday sales CRM lets you manage it all. You can use built-in automations or easily create your own to streamline any manual work so you can focus more time on sales.

similar_products.short_desc: The Sales CRM With Marketing Suite That Builds Rapport With You. CRM, Email Marketing, Social Posting, Texting, Video Email, And More.
similar_products.features:
98% of customers rate VipeCloud's Value For Money at 4 stars and above! 

VipeCloud is the Sales CRM with Marketing Suite that builds rapport with you. Our All-In-One solution includes CRM, Email Marketing, Social Posting, Texting, Video Email, Integrations, and More.

With VipeCloud's single solution + rapport building, your business will increase efficiency and accelerate growth. It's no surprise 99% of customers rate our support at 4+ stars.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Contact Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Contact Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Contact Management software provides powerful tools that enable storage, tracking, and management of contact information throughout an organization. Contact Management applications allow organizations to function more effectively by distributing current contact information for customers, contractors, vendors and others to all levels and locations of an organization. Contact Management solutions also often incorporate efficiency-increasing features such as lead management tools, employee task logs and customer interaction histories. Contact Management software is related to Campaign Management software, Lead Management software and Sales Force Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Lead Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Lead Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Lead Management software enables the forecasting, collection and tracking of sales leads. Through the use of Lead Management solutions, organizations can automate and manage their prospect database as well as share and distribute leads throughout the enterprise. Organizations can also use Lead Management tools to track the progress of leads, analyze the performance of sales staff and marketing campaigns and develop new leads from their existing customer base. Lead Management software is related to Contact Management software and Sales Force Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Marketing Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Marketing Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Marketing Automation software enables organizations to automate their marketing functions including campaign creation, market segmentation and response analysis. These applications also allow greater integration between sales staff and management as well as expanded abilities to evaluate the effectiveness of marketing campaigns. Marketing Automation solutions enable the enterprise-wide sharing of information, providing an essential conduit between management, sales and marketing operations. Marketing Automation software is related to Campaign Management software, Email Marketing software and Search Marketing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Sales Force Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Sales Force Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Sales Force Automation software manages an organization's sales force functions which can include: lead management, customer account management, contact management, quote management, forecasting, customer demographics and employee performance management. Sales Force Automation applications improve sales productivity while providing a method of distribution for sales analytics throughout an enterprise. Sales Force Automation software is related to Commission software, Contact Management software, Lead Management software and Quoting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Sales Tracking software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Sales Tracking tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Sales Tracking software enables businesses and sales teams to monitor pipelines, manage steps in the sales process, and track key performance numbers.

_source.long_desc: Microsoft Dynamics is a line of integrated, adaptable business management solutions that enable your people to make important business decisions with greater confidence. Microsoft Dynamics works like and with familiar Microsoft software-easing adoption and reducing the risks inherent with implementing a new solution. These solutions automate and streamline financial, customer relationship, and supply chain processes in a way that can help you drive business success.

Please contact Microsoft for further pricing details.

related_products.short_desc: Slack brings all your communication together in one place. It's real-time messaging, archiving and search for modern teams.
related_products.features: Slack is a collaboration hub, where the right people and the right information come together, helping everyone get work done. When your team needs to kick off a project, hire a new employee, deploy some code, review a sales contract, finalize next year's budget, measure an A/B test, plan your next office opening, and more, Slack has you covered. Try Slack with your team for free.

related_products.short_desc: Drive growth with Sales Cloud 360, the best-in-class sales solution that drives rep productivity on the world's #1 CRM platform.
related_products.features: Drive growth with Sales Cloud 360, the best-in-class sales solution that has helped power the world's best sales teams on the world's #1 CRM platform. Firms of all sizes, industries, and geographies, realize value faster with Sales Cloud 360. Increase rep productivity with data driven selling by quickly deploying industry-specific apps and best practice processes.  You also get access to 150,000+ sales organizations and a 2 million user-strong community that are passionate about sales growth.

related_products.short_desc: Webex brings together Calling, Meeting and Messaging modes of collaboration into a seamless, inclusive and intelligent experience.
related_products.features:
Webex brings together Calling, Meeting and Messaging modes of collaboration into a seamless, inclusive and intelligent experience.

Make meetings more interactive and engaging
-	Reduce disruptions with background noise removal and voice enhancement
-	Enable audiences to share their reactions with animated emojis and gesture recognition
-	Improve audience engagement with next-gen dynamic polling and Q&A by Slido
-	Customize the stage layout to focus on the content and people that matters most

related_products.short_desc: Zendesk Support is the leading help desk software built to improve customer satisfaction.
related_products.features: Zendesk offers the industry leading customer service solution. On average, it increases customer satisfaction by 25% and agent productivity by 30% at any scale. All your customer interactions live in a single, dynamic interface with features like web widgets, pre-defined ticket responses, and a full customer history. Get up and running quickly, and expect to see results even faster.

related_products.short_desc: Freshdesk is an easy-to-use customer service software that helps over 50,000 businesses worldwide create stellar customer experiences.
related_products.features: Freshdesk is a cloud-based helpdesk system that offers powerful solutions for customer service. Freshdesk unifies conversations from email, phone, web, chat and social, and helps you resolve issues across channels effortlessly. With Freshdesk, you can also automate workflows, offer convenient self-service options, manage SLAs, and generate reports. Freshdesk is used by over 50,000 customers, including Bridgestone, HP, Harvard University and DHL.

related_products.short_desc: ConnectWise Control provides the ability to view and control devices from anywhere there is an Internet connection.
related_products.features: ConnectWise Control (formerly ScreenConnect) is a fully functional remote support solution. The software gives you the ability to remotely view and control devices from anywhere there is an Internet connection. As a technician, regardless if you primarily support your customers personal computers or a huge enterprise infrastructure, the ability to quickly and effectively resolve problems allows you to save time and improve customer satisfaction.

related_products.short_desc: Put customer service at the heart of your company. Make agents more productive, managers more impactful and customers more empowered.
related_products.features: Zoho Desk is the industry's favourite customer service software with contextual AI that helps you to streamline your customer care, automating routine and managing multiple customer interactions gets easier on cloud. This includes conversations spread across various channels like email, phone, social media, live chat, and more, all from a single interface. Naturally, our free plan gives you 3 users free to help you get a head start with your customer service operations.

related_products.short_desc: LiveChat enables you to have real-time conversations with your customers while they are on your website.
related_products.features: LiveChat provides a cost-effective way for your support team to deliver a great experience across the entire customer journey. It makes customer service more efficient by letting you hold multiple chat sessions at the same time, send canned responses to frequently asked questions, add chat tags, review chat transcripts and send files to customers through the chat window.

related_products.short_desc: Great customer service starts with better customer service software. Impress your customers and increase their satisfaction.
related_products.features:
LiveAgent is a fully-featured Customer Service software with over 195+ integrations. 

Streamline all communication channels and manage them from a single shared company inbox. Enjoy social media integrations, unlimited ticket browsing history, call recordings, hybrid ticket streams, and more.

Companies like BMW, Yamaha, Huawei, Orange or Forbesfone use LiveAgent to deliver customer wow to 150M end users worldwide. 

Start with a 14-Day free trial, no credit card needed, no contracts.

related_products.short_desc: Increase customer satisfaction and team efficiency with Intercom's market-leading messenger, smart automation and self-service tools.
related_products.features: Intercom enables personalized customer service at scale, increasing customer satisfaction and support team efficiency. Powered by a modern messenger, smart automation and self-service tools, along with all the features you need from a modern support solution including a next-gen omnichannel inbox, conversation routing, workload management, reporting and more.

related_products.short_desc: Easy to implement web-based Customer Service software with a focus on B2B customer management and team collaboration.
related_products.features: TeamSupport is a post-sale customer support software solution built specifically for the unique needs of B2B technology-enabled companies. Built around the entire B2B customer, rather than a focus on each individual contact or ticket, TeamSupport helps solve for sophisticated client needs, fuels successful client interactions, and ultimately results in increased lifetime customer value. Nationally recognized TeamSupport suite of solutions includes TeamInsights, and TeamSuccess.

Deliver email, self-service, and live chat support from one powerful platform that feels just like your inbox. Answer 52% more emails with ease and reduce your support volume by 30%. You'll have happier customers and fewer support requests - everyone wins.

Front makes it easy for teams to send personalized replies faster, organize messages across channels, and always delight a customer. As your needs change, Front's flexible workflows change with you. Teams of 5 and 5,000 alike use Front to scale their communication without compromising on quality or efficiency.

similar_products.short_desc: Unnecessary support tickets are costly. Add interactive guides to high ticket articles to decrease tickets & drive self-serve success.
similar_products.features: Allow users to self-serve toward success where and when it's needed with Stonly. Build interactive guides that adapt to each customer's situation and provide them with the exact information they need to be successful. Add guides to your website with no code, include them in your help center or build an interactive knowledge base. See why 1,000's of companies trust Stonly to provide unparalleled support.

similar_products.short_desc: Ada is an easy to use customer support automation platform.
similar_products.features: As the market leader in Automated Customer Experience (ACX), Ada personalizes customer engagement by putting the power of AI in the hands of the people who know your business best. With Ada, it's simple for non-technical teams to build an automated, enterprise-class chatbot platform that solves 70%+ of customer inquiries.

similar_products.short_desc: Kustomer is the omnichannel SaaS CRM platform reimagining enterprise customer service to deliver standout experiences.
similar_products.features:
Kustomer is the top-rated CRM, helping top brands deliver modern customer service that creates customers for life. Powered by AI, Kustomer scales to meet the needs of contact centers and businesses, enabling companies to deliver effortless, consistent and personalized service and support through a single timeline view.

Founded in 2015 by serial entrepreneurs Brad Birnbaum and Jeremy Suriel, Kustomer has raised over $174M in venture funding.

similar_products.short_desc: The worlds #1 customer service platform, empowers every service employee with the innovative tools, and unified data.
similar_products.features: Deliver great service and a flexible agent experience, from anywhere. Give agents a holistic view of every customer, whether they're in the contact center or working remote. Scale and optimize service by leveraging AI and integrating popular support channels - like phone, messaging, and chat - directly into the agent workspace. Resolve cases faster by combining automated processes with easy access to the full details, context, and history of every case and customer interaction.

similar_products.short_desc: Ticket Management, Customer Success, Customer Experience, Knowledge Base, NPS, CSAT, CES, Customer portal, Mobile apps, CRM data Sync
similar_products.features: Ticketing software Easy to use, Affordable, and Scalable. Built to manage the complexities that teams need to drive customer success and retention. We do this by unifying survey tools, NPS, CSAT, knowledge base, data synchronizations to Salesforce, dashboards, analytics, scheduling tools, team scorecards, and customer success health scoring.

similar_products.short_desc: SMS texting and live chat for business has never been easier than with Avochato's solutions for teams, marketers and contact centers.
similar_products.features:
SMS texting and live chat has never been easier than with Avochato's solutions for teams, marketers and contact centers.  With no programming required, you can setup your Avochato phone number in minutes to text your prospects, customers, or staff. Segment, import, and broadcast to your contacts to scale your teams communications.

Avochato integrates with platforms such as Salesforce, Slack, MS Teams, and Zapier. Enable prospects to text you from a Google Ad with the AdWords API integration.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Call Center software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Call Center tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Call Center software automates and standardizes the process of receiving and responding to customer phone calls. These solutions enable better monitoring of the customer experience, workflow management and evaluation of employee performance. Whether designed for virtual or site-based locations, Call Center applications manage and catalog the process of customer calls and often allow customers to track the progress of their request via the internet. Call Center software is related to Customer Service software and Help Desk software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Complaint Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Complaint Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Complaint Management software helps to track, organize and resolve customer complaints and maximizes the productivity of the employees who deal with customers directly. These solutions are characterized by the ability to accurately capture, classify and route complaints, enabling communication across the team and insuring compliance. Complaint Management software is related to Customer Satisfaction software, Customer Service software and Help Desk software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Contact Center software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Contact Center tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Contact Center software automates and standardizes the process of receiving and responding to customer requests across different communication channels.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Relationship Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Relationship Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Relationship Management (CRM) software enables customer interaction, support and relationship management. The purpose of a CRM application is to enable organizations to better manage their customers through the introduction of reliable systems, processes and procedures. Customer Relationship Management software integrates organizational processes across marketing, sales and customer services. CRM software is related to Contract Management software and Online CRM software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Help Desk software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Help Desk tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Help Desk software enables organizations to respond more efficiently to users. Support software can aid in answering technical and functional questions by providing improved methodologies for ticket tracking, IT management and customer service support. Integrating these elements improves the ability of customer service departments to provide fast and effective support to employees, end users and customers. Help Desk solutions can also facilitate the flow of new information from users, contributing to an organization's existing knowledge base. Help Desk software is related to Call Center software and Customer Service software .

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Live Chat software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Live Chat tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Live Chat software helps organizations connect with their customers in real time. Live Chat applications can be used for customer support, lead generation, and customer engagement. This type of software includes widgets that can be integrated into existing websites, as well as more robust stand alone solutions that allow businesses to track customer interactions, response and conversion rates.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Online CRM software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Online CRM tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Online CRM software enables web-based customer interaction, support and relationship management. Online customer relationship management applications provide customers with access to an organization's knowledge base assets, allowing customers to pursue a self-guided path to resolving product-related issues, either via the web or over the phone. Online CRM solutions can help increase the efficiency and utility of a call center, website or help desk by empowering customers to resolve issues on their own without engaging with customer service staff. Online CRM software is related to Customer Relationship Management software.

supported_countries.name: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

_source.short_desc: Integrated business management solution that automates financial, customer relationship and supply chain processes.
_source.long_desc: Microsoft Dynamics is a line of integrated, adaptable business management solutions that enable your people to make important business decisions with greater confidence. Microsoft Dynamics works like and with familiar Microsoft software-easing adoption and reducing the risks inherent with implementing a new solution. These solutions automate and streamline financial, customer relationship, and supply chain processes in a way that can help you drive business success.
_source.pricing_details:
Customer Insights: From $1500 Per tenant/month
Customer Voice: From $200 per tenant/month
Sales Professional: $65 per user/month
Sales Enterprise: $95 per user/month
Sales Premium: $135 per user/month
Microsoft Relationship Sales: $162 per user/month

Please contact Microsoft for further pricing details.
_source.target_audience: Dynamics 365's plans can accommodate for households, individuals, or even enterprises.

related_products.short_desc: HubSpot CRM has everything you need to organize, track, and build better relationships with leads and customers.
related_products.features: Whether you've got a small team of five or a sophisticated sales force of 500, HubSpot offers pricing and packaging options that grow with you. HubSpot customer relationship management (CRM) software is built for companies that want to spend less time logging data. It keeps all your contacts in one centralized, customizable database. And you can see everything about a lead in one place -- no more digging through inboxes to find information. Start using the free HubSpot CRM today.

related_products.short_desc: ClickUp is the future of work - it's one app to replace them all. ClickUp is the #1 fastest growing productivity app in 2022.
related_products.features:
ClickUp is an all-in-one productivity platform that eliminates work silos. It's the hub where teams come together to plan, organize, and collaborate on work using tasks, Docs, Chat, Goals, Whiteboards, and more. 

Easily customized with just a few clicks, ClickUp helps teams of all types and sizes deliver work more effectively. By replacing inflexible and overlapping tools, ClickUp helps teams save one day each week!

related_products.short_desc: Pipedrive is an easy to implement CRM software tool that helps you focus on the activities that drive deals to close.
related_products.features: Pipedrive is a sales-focused customer relationship management tool that teams of all sizes love using. With 100'000+ paying customers spanning across 179 countries, sales teams are drawn in by our CRMs simple yet powerful design that prioritizes usability above all else. When using Pipedrive, nothing falls through the cracks, allowing your team to spend less time filing and more time selling with a CRM software that is both agile and powerful.

related_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.
related_products.features:
Smartsheet, an online work execution platform, empowers organizations to plan, track, automate, and report on work. Over 80,000 brands rely on Smartsheet for project and work management because of its easy-to-use interface, real-time gantt charts and dashboards, and work automation features. 
*2018 Awards: Named a Leader in Enterprise Collaborative Work Management by Forrester Research, Selected to Deloittes Fast 500 List, Recognized for Technology Innovation & Vision by 451 Research

related_products.short_desc: Nimble is the simple, smart CRM for Office 365 & G Suite that works for you -- everywhere you work.
related_products.features: Nimble is the simple, smart CRM for Office 365 & G Suite that works for you by automatically combining your contacts, communication histories, email inboxes, and calendar appointments with over 250+ SaaS business app contacts and social media connections (including Linkedin, Twitter, Facebook) into one unified team relationship manager.

related_products.short_desc: ActiveCampaign CRM helps you sell more in less time by combining automated lead prioritization, task creation, and contact management.
related_products.features: ActiveCampaign's CRM combines contact organization with sales automation, helping you sell more in less time. Prioritize your leads, keep track of your tasks, and automate contact management so nothing falls through the cracks. See your whole sales process at a glance and track every interaction, keeping your team on the same page. Features like lead scoring, win probability, and automated segmentation combined with marketing automation turns your team into a well-oiled, deal-closing machine.

related_products.short_desc:
The smarter way for small businesses to do great work
Keap organizes your client information & daily work in one place, freeing you up
related_products.features: Grow your business with the all-in-one CRM, sales & marketing software for serious business owners. Our platform organizes your customer information and daily work in one place, freeing you up from repetitive tasks so you have more time to focus on growing your business.

related_products.short_desc: Run your business your way with a fully integrated CRM for small to medium sized businesses.
related_products.features: Stay organized as you scale and grow. Finally, a CRM that?s easy to use, fully customizable and puts you in control of how you manage your leads, customers, tasks, team, projects, marketing and more. Create your free account to start customizing your CRM today.

similar_products.short_desc: Drive growth with Sales Cloud 360, the best-in-class sales solution that drives rep productivity on the world's #1 CRM platform.
similar_products.features: Drive growth with Sales Cloud 360, the best-in-class sales solution that has helped power the world's best sales teams on the world's #1 CRM platform. Firms of all sizes, industries, and geographies, realize value faster with Sales Cloud 360. Increase rep productivity with data driven selling by quickly deploying industry-specific apps and best practice processes.  You also get access to 150,000+ sales organizations and a 2 million user-strong community that are passionate about sales growth.

similar_products.short_desc: Zendesk Sell is sales CRM software that helps you close more deals.
similar_products.features: Zendesk Sell is sales CRM software that helps you close more deals. This sales platform tracks all your customer interactions in one unified interface. It's quick to implement and easy to use: 70% of companies are able to get Sell up and running in 7 days or less. Your teams will be able to focus on selling not admin work and can spend less time on data entry. 80% of customers agree that Zendesk has made their teams more efficient.

similar_products.short_desc: NetSuite CRM+ delivers your business with powerful front-office capabilities in a single, cloud-based CRM solution.
similar_products.features: NetSuites CRM+ is a complete, front-office solution that unlocks a real-time, 360-degree view of your customers. CRM+ seamlessly integrates your customer-focused activities with accounting, e-commerce, warehousing and shipping applications to support your entire sales process and customer life cycle starting from a lead, and progressing through opportunity, sales order, fulfillment, renewal, upsell, cross-sell and support.

similar_products.short_desc: Improve your team's accountability and productivity with flexible CRM that matches your sales process exactly.
similar_products.features: Improve your team's accountability and productivity with a flexible CRM that matches your complex sales process exactly. Track tasks, leads, and opportunities in real time. Built-in mobile forms and workflows keep everything moving, trigger-based actions make your team more productive, and automated reporting keeps your stakeholders in the know. Find out why over 80% of the Fortune 50 trusts Quickbase.

similar_products.short_desc: TigerLRM is an all-in-one Sales Enablement Software with tools for Content Management, Training & Coaching, In-Built CRM, and more.

similar_products.short_desc:
Every CRM tool you need to manage clients, proposals, contracts, invoices, payments, and more. 

Use code "ONLY1" to start for $1/mo.
similar_products.features:
The go-to CRM for independent professionals-that's HoneyBook.

HoneyBook makes it easy to book more clients, manage projects, and get paid all in one place.

With proposals, invoices, contracts, payments, and scheduling at your fingertips, you have everything you need to give clients a great experience.

Get your first 6 months for just $1/mo with code "ONLY1".

similar_products.short_desc: monday sales CRM empowers sales teams to manage every aspect of their sales cycle and customer data in one centralized place.
similar_products.features: Perfect for small-medium businesses, monday sales CRM is a no-code fully-customizable CRM built on top of monday.com Work OS. Dubbed the CRM without the frustration, it handles all sales processes and client communication in one place. From capturing leads, managing contact info, tracking deals or collaborating across departments, monday sales CRM lets you manage it all. You can use built-in automations or easily create your own to streamline any manual work so you can focus more time on sales.

With VipeCloud's single solution + rapport building, your business will increase efficiency and accelerate growth. It's no surprise 99% of customers rate our support at 4+ stars.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Contact Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Contact Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Contact Management software provides powerful tools that enable storage, tracking, and management of contact information throughout an organization. Contact Management applications allow organizations to function more effectively by distributing current contact information for customers, contractors, vendors and others to all levels and locations of an organization. Contact Management solutions also often incorporate efficiency-increasing features such as lead management tools, employee task logs and customer interaction histories. Contact Management software is related to Campaign Management software, Lead Management software and Sales Force Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Lead Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Lead Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Lead Management software enables the forecasting, collection and tracking of sales leads. Through the use of Lead Management solutions, organizations can automate and manage their prospect database as well as share and distribute leads throughout the enterprise. Organizations can also use Lead Management tools to track the progress of leads, analyze the performance of sales staff and marketing campaigns and develop new leads from their existing customer base. Lead Management software is related to Contact Management software and Sales Force Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Marketing Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Marketing Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Marketing Automation software enables organizations to automate their marketing functions including campaign creation, market segmentation and response analysis. These applications also allow greater integration between sales staff and management as well as expanded abilities to evaluate the effectiveness of marketing campaigns. Marketing Automation solutions enable the enterprise-wide sharing of information, providing an essential conduit between management, sales and marketing operations. Marketing Automation software is related to Campaign Management software, Email Marketing software and Search Marketing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Sales Force Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Sales Force Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Sales Force Automation software manages an organization's sales force functions which can include: lead management, customer account management, contact management, quote management, forecasting, customer demographics and employee performance management. Sales Force Automation applications improve sales productivity while providing a method of distribution for sales analytics throughout an enterprise. Sales Force Automation software is related to Commission software, Contact Management software, Lead Management software and Quoting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Sales Tracking software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Sales Tracking tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Sales Tracking software enables businesses and sales teams to monitor pipelines, manage steps in the sales process, and track key performance numbers.
